content: Since Lean cannot generate code for recursors (https://leanprover-community.github.io/archive/stream/270676-lean4/topic/code.20generator.20does.20not.20support.20recursor.html), is there a way to generate computable code with match via metaprogramming?
Will there ever be support for code generation of recursors? I don't get what is hard about it
#lean4 > âœ” "code generator does not support recursor" @ ðŸ’¬ is a good thread
the FRO has someone working on the new code generator right now, so it could become supported at some point
Leni Aniva has marked this topic as resolved.
